mapper.sql: id, asset_group, number, name, ethernet_port, serial_port, install_type, serial, area_id, category_model, manufacturer, asset_status, admittance_status, operation_system, system_bit, responsible_user_id, location, latitude, longitude, house_location, firmware_version, uuid, contact_tel, email, asset_source, importance_degree, describle, parent_id, tags, first_enter_nett, first_discover_time, is_innet, service_life, buy_date, warranty, gmt_create, gmt_modified, memo, create_user, modify_user, status

mapper.select:
select
from

select
from

select count(1) count from ( select asset.id from asset asset left join asset_network_card asset_network_card on asset.id = asset_network_card.asset_id and asset_network_card.status = 1 left join asset_category_model asset_category_model on asset.category_model = asset_category_model.id left join asset_user asset_user on asset.responsible_user_id = asset_user.id LEFT JOIN asset_safety_equipment asset_safety_equipment ON asset.id = asset_safety_equipment.asset_id LEFT JOIN asset_network_equipment asset_network_equipment ON asset.id = asset_network_equipment.asset_id
group by asset.id) t

SELECT count(1) count FROM asset a left JOIN asset_network_equipment b on a.id = b.asset_id and b.`status` = 1 left JOIN asset_safety_equipment d on a.id = d.asset_id AND d.`status` = 1 left JOIN asset_network_card c on a.id = c.asset_id and c.`status` = 1 WHERE (b.inner_ip = #{ip} OR c.ip_address = #{ip} OR d.ip = #{ip}) AND a.`status` = 1 AND a.status !=9
select id,type,name,parent_id from

select distinct manufacturer from
where status = 1

select
from
where 1 = 1
and category_model in
#{item}

select manufacturer, count(manufacturer) num from
where status=1
and area_id in
#{areaId}
and asset_status in
#{item}
GROUP BY manufacturer order by num desc

select asset_status, count(asset_status) num from
where status=1
and area_id in
#{areaId}
GROUP BY asset_status

select count(1) from
where status=1 and asset_status!=9
and area_id in
#{areaId}
mapper.update: update asset SET asset_group = #{assetGroupName} where id = #{assetId}
mapper.select:
select count(distinct (t1.asset_id)) from asset_patch_rel t1 inner join patch p ON t1.patch_id = p.id inner join asset t2 on t1.asset_id = t2.id where t1.patch_status != 5
and t2.area_id IN
#{item}
and t1.status = 1 and t2.status = 1 AND p.STATUS = 1 AND p.patch_status = 3 and t2.asset_status in(7,8)

select count(distinct (t1.asset_id)) from asset_vul_rel t1 inner JOIN vul v ON t1.vul_id = v.id inner join asset t2 on t1.asset_id = t2.id where t1.vul_status != 5
and t2.area_id IN
#{item}
and t1.status = 1 and t2.status = 1 AND v.STATUS = 1 AND v.vul_status = 4 and t2.asset_status in(7,8)

select number from
where id = #{id}

select area_id from
where id = #{id}

SELECT ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM asset WHERE category_model =#{categoryModeId} AND `status` = 1 ) + ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM asset_software WHERE category_model =#{categoryModeId} AND `status` = 1) as n

select uuid from
where id = #{id}
